sentences.en: ...a delightful river with a profusion of wild flowers along its banks.
sentences.cn: ...一条令人愉悦的河，岸上开满了野花。

sentences.en: A great profusion of scalers and ratemeters is available commercially.
sentences.cn: 在市场上也可以买到大量的定标器和计数率计.

sentences.en: A profusion of leaves bursts out on trees in the springtime.
sentences.cn: 春天许许多多的叶子从树上冒出来.

sentences.en: Around the pond grows a profusion of luxuriant trees.
sentences.cn: 荷塘四面,长着许多树,蓊蓊郁郁的.

sentences.en: Gambling was here in profusion, and dancing in plenty.
sentences.cn: 在这里大家跳舞跳得忙, 赌钱赌得凶.

sentences.en: Hundreds of flowers are blooming in profusion.
Olive groves, grapes, and citrus fruits grow in profusion.
sentences.cn: 橄榄、葡萄和柑橘类水果产量丰富。

sentences.en: Roses were growing in profusion against the old wall.
sentences.cn: 紧挨着旧墙长着很多玫瑰花.

sentences.en: She went stealthily as a cat through this profusion of growth.
sentences.cn: 她从这一片繁茂丛杂的幽花野草中间,象一只猫似的,轻轻悄悄地走了过去.

sentences.en: The Dart is a delightful river with a profusion of wild flowers along its banks.
sentences.cn: 达特河是一条令人心旷神怡的河，岸边到处开着野花。

sentences.en: The leaves are falling in profusion.
There perfumes of the most varied kinds mingled together in tropical profusion.
sentences.cn: 那儿散发着赤道地带特有浓馥的香气.

sentences.en: There were books in profusion and magazines and newspapers.
sentences.cn: 有大量的书籍,杂志和报纸.

words.tran_cn: 丰富的；很多的；慷慨的；浪费的

trans.tran_cn: 丰富，充沛，慷慨，大方，浪费，挥霍
trans.tran_en: a very large amount of something
